ISSUE.TITLE: WP_JSON_CustomPostType does not accept JSON for editing/creating posts

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Only supply third param to DateTime::createFromFormat if the third param is a DateTimeZone object (closes #89)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Force WP_JSON_CustomPostType to accept JSON for post editing/creation (closes #90)
